statements: SELECT * FROM microfinance_loans;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, approval_date FROM microfinance_loans WHERE approval_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, repayment_status FROM microfinance_loans WHERE repayment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, approval_date FROM microfinance_loans ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, approval_date, repayment_status FROM microfinance_loans
SELECT borrower_name, approval_date, loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans WHERE repayment_status='Pending'
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000.00 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, approval_date FROM microfinance_loans WHERE approval_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY approval_date ASC
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, repayment_status FROM microfinance_loans WHERE repayment_status='Delayed' ORDER BY borrower_name DESC
SELECT * FROM MicrofinanceLoans;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM MicrofinanceLoans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM MicrofinanceLoans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MicrofinanceLoans WHERE loan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT borrower_name, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_repayments FROM MicrofinanceLoans JOIN LoanRepayments ON MicrofinanceLoans.loan_id = LoanRepayments.loan_id GROUP BY borrower_name;
SELECT * FROM MicrofinanceLoans WHERE loan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM MicrofinanceLoans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, payment_date FROM MicrofinanceLoans INNER JOIN LoanRepayments ON MicrofinanceLoans.loan_id = LoanRepayments.loan_id WHERE amount_paid >= 1000;
SELECT borrower_name, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM MicrofinanceLoans INNER JOIN LoanRepayments ON MicrofinanceLoans.loan_id = LoanRepayments.loan_id GROUP BY borrower_name;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, payment_date FROM MicrofinanceLoans LEFT JOIN LoanRepayments ON MicrofinanceLoans.loan_id = LoanRepayments.loan_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loan_details;
SELECT loan_id, entrepreneur_name, loan_amount FROM loan_details;
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name, loan_id, contact_number FROM borrower_details;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_status FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, contact_number FROM borrower_details WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM loan_details WHERE loan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT loan_id, entrepreneur_name, loan_amount FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, contact_number FROM borrower_details WHERE loan_id IN (SELECT loan_id FROM loan_details WHERE loan_status = 'Pending');
SELECT loan_id, SUM(repayment_amount) AS total_repayments FROM repayment_schedule GROUP BY loan_id HAVING total_repayments > 10000;
SELECT borrower_name, repayment_amount, payment_date FROM borrower_details JOIN repayment_schedule ON borrower_details.loan_id = repayment_schedule.loan_id ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM microfinance_loans
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_status='approved'
SELECT * FROM borrowers ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, approval_date, loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_status='pending' ORDER BY approval_date ASC
SELECT officer_name, branch_location FROM loan_officers
SELECT * FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_status FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM loan_repayments ORDER BY repayment_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, approval_date FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, contact_number, income FROM borrowers WHERE employment_status = 'employed' ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT application_id, application_date FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT officer_name FROM LoanOfficers WHERE officer_id = 3;
SELECT application_id, report_text FROM LoanReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT application_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT ls.application_id, la.applicant_name, ls.application_status FROM LoanApplications la JOIN LoanStatus ls ON la.application_id = ls.application_id;

SELECT lr.report_id, la.applicant_name, lr.report_text FROM LoanReports lr JOIN LoanApplications la ON lr.application_id = la.application_id WHERE lr.report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lr.report_date ASC;
